嶴字的基本解释

嶴
ào
同“岙”。

嶴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ào］
亦作“1”。亦作“岙1”。
(1)山中曲折隐秘处。亦指山中平地。参见“山岙”。
(2)水湾可泊船处。
(3)指水中小岛。
(4)地名用字。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［ào］
Also known as "1". Also known as "Ao 1".
(1) The twists and turns and hidden places in the mountains. Also refers to the plains in the mountains. See "Shanao".
(2) The water bay can be berthed.
(3) Refers to small islands in the water.
(4) The place name uses words.
